scripts.install: concurrently "turbo run install --filter=backend" "turbo run install --filter=admin-panel" "pnpm run install:mobile"
scripts.clean: concurrently "turbo run clean --filter=backend" "turbo run clean --filter=admin-panel" "pnpm run clean:mobile"
scripts.dev: concurrently "turbo run dev --filter=backend" "turbo run dev --filter=admin-panel" "pnpm run dev:mobile"
scripts.dev:mobile: cd apps/mobile && flutter emulators --launch Pixel_7_Pro_API_34 && flutter run lib/main.dart
